attributes.action: Ban the use of nicotinamide pesticides which have been banned in other European countries as they are toxic to bees .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nicotinamides are a systemic pesticide which has been banned in France and in other countries because of its toxicity to bees.  Bee honey and beeswax has been shown to contain traces of these pesticides and in view of the devastating losses occuring now this pesticide should be banned from use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
